Explore spaces

Workspace made simple

Distraction-free space

Breather gives you and your team private space to focus and innovate, without the distractions of shared coworking spaces and overcrowded offices.

Equipped for productivity

Whiteboards, mobile chargers, WiFi, HDTVs and more. Each space includes everything you need to do your best work.

Flexible floorplans

Change up the space to suit any meeting, presentation, or workspace needs. Your local Breather team will take care of setting things up.

Transparent pricing

With Breather, there’s no long-term commitments or hidden fees—you pay only for the space you need, when you need it.

Hands-on help

Your dedicated account manager and local Breather team are ready to help with any requests, and our customer care team is available 24/7.

Global availability

With 500+ locations across 10 cities worldwide, it’s easy to find the right space at the right time, wherever you are.

How Breather works

1. Easily reserve space

Whether booking instantly online or through your Breather account manager, it’s easy to find space for a few hours, days or months.

2. Simple and secure access

Each Breather space is secured with a keypad, accessible with a unique access code available only to you and your guests.

3. Take a tour

Want to see some spaces in person first? Connect with our customer care team by phone, email, or live chat to set up a tour.

Who uses Breather?

Big brands, small businesses and individuals.

Breather, space made simple

Modern workspace, all to yourself - for hours, days or months
